code: import React from'react';import{Radar}from'react-chartjs-2';import Chart from'chart.js/auto';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var RadarChart=function RadarChart(_ref){var serverData=_ref.serverData;var uniquePestle=[];serverData.forEach(function(i){if(!uniquePestle.includes(i.pestle)&&i.pestle!==""){uniquePestle.push(i.pestle);}});var pestleCount=uniquePestle.map(function(item){return{pestle:item,count:serverData.filter(function(i){return i.pestle===item;}).length};});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{height:'50vh',width:'45vw'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Radar,{data:{labels:uniquePestle,datasets:[{label:"Projects ",data:pestleCount.map(function(i){return i.count;}),borderWidth:1}]},options:{maintainAspectRatio:false,scales:{y:{type:'linear',beginAtZero:true}}},height:300})});};export default RadarChart;
